sentences: Leon Lee Dorsey (born March 12, 1958) is an American jazz bassist, composer, arranger, producer, and educator known for his well-received debut for Landmark Records.
He teaches at the Berklee School of Music in Boston.
He released his debut album The Watcher in 1995 and followed it up with 1999â€™s Song of Songs.
In 2003, he founded Leon Lee Dorsey Studios in New York City.
